message.raw:
minor bug fixes that affect the dContactApprox1 friction model:
(1) the initial nub expansion was too inclusive, the findex variables
    should not have been considered to be unbounded.
(2) in the hit_first_friction_index test we should treat 0*infinity as 0,
    so that mu=infinity can be reliably used with the dContactApprox1
    friction model.

message:
minor bug fixes that affect the dContactApprox1 friction model:
(1) the initial nub expansion was too inclusive, the findex variables
    should not have been considered to be unbounded.
(2) in the hit_first_friction_index test we should treat 0*infinity as 0,
    so that mu=infinity can be reliably used with the dContactApprox1
